title: burger
name: Laid back
desc: Burger restaurants are not for the fancy crowd; it’s where people can go wearing t-shirts and jeans, enjoy good food with family or friends in a laid-back kind of atmosphere

title: burger
name: Signature burger
desc: If you thought of an awesome name for your signature burger, use it in the name; otherwise, the burger may be named after the restaurant

title: burger
name: Alliterations
desc: Burger obviously starts with the letter “b” which opens up a whole world of naming opportunities when you consider alliterations. If you’re not familiar with this, an alliteration is a repetition of a sound in consecutive words. For example: Bob’s Burger Bar

title: burger
name: The Burger Barn
desc: This scrumptious burger sits under a chilli lamb pattie, roasted bell pepper dip, onions, tomatoes and lettuce.

title: burger
name: Perfect Lamb Satay Burger
desc: Succulent lamb burgers with the crunchiness of cashew nuts and the creaminess of peanut butter smothered with a gorgeous satay sauce.

title: burger
name: Lamb and Tomato Stuffed Burger
desc: A perfectly shaped lamb pattie cooked to perfection. The tomatoes arent just a topping but the spotlight of this beautiful dish.

title: burger
name: Crunchy Chicken and Fish Burger
desc: If a burger for you is all about the meat and protein then youre at the right place. Experience the goodness of chicken, fish and a tangy hot and sour sauce.

title: burger
name: Chicken Feta Cheese Burger With Potato Salad
desc: Chicken mince marinated with salt, pepper and feta cheese is only the beginning of this ultimate wonder. To accompany this weve got a guilt free potato salad with a yogurt dressing.

title: burger
name: Stuffed Bean Burger
desc: Being a vegetarian is no reason to deny yourself the gluttonous pleasures of an overstuffed bun. Try this bean burger with a chipotle chilli and a dash of lime.

title: pizza
name: Margherita
desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, pepperoni, and Stracchino (soft cheese)

title: pizza
name: Quattro Stagioni
desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, pepperoni, and Stracchino (soft cheese)

title: pizza
name: Fattoria
desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, mushrooms, artichokes, anchovies, and oregano.

title: pasta
name: Ortolana
desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, mushrooms, artichokes, anchovies, and oregano.

title: coffee
name: Espresso
desc: The espresso, also known as a short black, is approximately 1 oz. of highly concentrated coffee. Although simple in appearance, it can be difficult to master

title: icecream
name: Blue Heaven
desc: Blue Heaven is a milkshake and topping flavour sold primarily in Australia. It is blue in colour, and its taste is a mix of vanilla and raspberry
